summary: Senior operations and service delivery leader with 15+ years of experience across BPO/outsourcing, strategy planning, bid management, transition, and P&L management. Proven ability to drive revenue growth, optimize processes, and manage multi-location delivery with strong client relationships and leadership across diverse engagements.

experience.title: Business Account Lead
experience.description: Managed client relationships and delivery for an outsourcing contract, including P&L ownership, team leadership, and implementation of standard processes and tools to drive operational efficiencies. Participated in RFI/RFP responses and business case development; negotiated changes and ensured contractual compliance; collaborated with sales for opportunities; validated delivery capability and SLAs; led transition and service delivery, with a focus on minimizing escalations and maximizing profitability.

experience.title: General Manager
experience.description: Program management of two engagements in F&A and Legal BPO for Nordic and US clients. End-to-end service delivery leadership for two engagements with up to 250 billable agents across multiple towers; single point of contact for client relationships and contract delivery; identified optimization opportunities; managed risks; ensured retention and stakeholder alignment; partnered with HR, capability development, and sales to sustain growth.

experience.title: Operations Lead
experience.description: Managed Global Biostatistics and Programming and Document Technology towers for a US-based Pharma client, as well as Data Entry and Safety Review towers. Responsibilities included service delivery, SLA compliance, capacity planning, hiring forecasting, quarterly/monthly target setting, trainings, and client liaison; led process improvements, performance metrics, and incident management; ensured client satisfaction and productivity gains.

experience.title: Assistant Manager/ Manager
experience.description: Led teams for B2B Order to Cash and Credit Balance projects; ensured SLA targets and month-on-month cash reductions; managed petty cash write-offs; introduced quality rigor, set up performance metrics, training, and HR coordination; achieved recognition for performance and process improvements.

experience.title: Team Leader
experience.description: Supervised inbound/outbound collections calls; ensured SLAs; conducted training and recruitment; transitioned processes; provided performance evaluations and rewards; prepared monthly invoicing discussions; COPC-aligned process improvements.

experience.title: Senior Technician
experience.description: Provided technical support for a major ISP and software solutions provider; delivered training to new hires, coached agents, maintained dashboards, and monitored calls; achieved high CSAT scores and awards for top performance.

experience.title: Process Developer
experience.description: Made outbound collection calls; handled escalated calls; mentored and trained new hires; updated dashboards and shared best practices; received recognition for performance.

certifications: Gold Certification: Operations Management (ISB & Accenture Joint Program)
